title: About
paragraphs: I'm an independent developer currently living in the Knoxville Area
I graduated summa cum laude from the University of Tennessee, Knoxville in May 2020,  with a B.S. in Computer Science.

I was a teaching assistant for two separate data structure courses. Before that, I worked with the University of Tennessee's TENNLab to help research and develop neuromorphic technologies and learning techniques. Prior to that, I worked with Oak Ridge National Laboratory's Material Demonstration Facility, assisting with the development of a slicing program tailored to large-scale 3D printers.
In my personal life, I enjoy watching and performing comedy, writing, doodling, and hanging out with friends and colleagues.

footer.address: 222 13th St, Apt 5, Knoxville TN 37916, United States
